question: 措辞
sourceMnemonic: You <kanji>set aside</kanji> these <kanji>word</kanji>s specifically so you could get the <vocabulary>wording</vocabulary> right. Wording is important sometimes, like when you're trying to talk about something sensitive, or when you're writing a poem. Sometimes only certain words will do.
